text: Opelousas is the parish seat of St. Landry Parish, Louisiana, United States. It is the most populous municipality in St. Landry Parish. ==Other websites== * * Opelousas and St. Landry Parish * Louisiana's African American Heritage Trail * St. Landry Parish Economic Industrial Development District * St. Landry Parish Tourist Commission * USGenWeb St. Landry Parish * USGenWeb Genealogy Records for St. Landry Parish Category:Cities in Louisiana Category:Settlements in St. Landry Parish, Louisiana Louisiana Category:Parish seats in Louisiana Category:1720 establishments Category:18th-century establishments in Louisiana Category:1720s establishments in the Thirteen Colonies Category:Acadiana
title: Opelousas, Louisiana
